ValidationRule.description: Rule to prevent closed date not to be less than or greater then today when the opportunity is put to closed won for PNG Market
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( CloseDate < TODAY() || CloseDate > TODAY(),
Digicel_Country__c ="PNG", ISCHANGED( StageName ) || ISCHANGED( CloseDate ), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won")||ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed-Won"),
RecordType.Name ="Digicel PNG GSM" || RecordType.Name ="Digicel PNG ICT" || RecordType.Name = "Digicel PNG ICT & GSM", $Profile.Name <>"System Administrator" && $Profile.Name <>"PNG - Sales Operations" && $Profile.Name <>"PNG - Billing/Legal" && $Profile.Name <>"PNG - Service Manager")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Close Date Must not be Less Then or Greater then Today
